Package ohos.agp.render

Class PdfGenerator.PageInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.render.PdfGenerator.PageInfo
  • Enclosing class:
    PdfGenerator

    public static final class PdfGenerator.PageInfo
extends Object
    Describes the metadata of a page in a PDF file.

    You can use this class to generate pages for drawing.

    Since:
    3
